text:
Neoprospecta | Python backend developer | Florian√≥polis, Brazil | https://neoprospecta.com/en/

We are a company dedicated to development and commercialization of microbiological analyzes based on DNA sequencing and bioinformatics.

We are looking for someone with a solid experience in Django, django-rest-framework, Linux, git and PEP8.

To apply send a cover letter a resume/cv and - ideally - your github profile to ricardo@neoprospecta.com
